channel.title: How Do I Get My Server Running!
channel.description:
Please I Really Badly Need Help... I Cant Seem To Get My Server Running Using No-Ip. I Have Always Used Hamatchi But I Really Dont Want To.
I Have: Port Forwarded... Opened Port In My Computer... Downloaded No-Ip And Added A Host...
But What Do I Do To Get It Up And Running So Other People Can Play It =[ Someone Help Please
Ty, Dillz [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2007, 12:40:56 PM[/size][hr]Someone Help =[

item.title: How Do I Get My Server Running!
item.dc:creator: @manofwar12 manofwar12
item.description:
@manofwar12 wrote:

[quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:2, topic:168189”]no-ip.com

register.

download moparscape w/ aryan and start a hybrid server.

add ur no-ip to the ip address and make sure ur running ur server, there u go[/quote]

You also need to compile it if you havnt done that.

Read full topic
item.source: How Do I Get My Server Running!

register.

download moparscape w/ aryan and start a hybrid server.

add ur no-ip to the ip address and make sure ur running ur server, there u go
